programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS, S05E09, Imaging a black hole was a breakthrough in astronomy, now with the new satellite IXPE high energy telescope we will be looking at some of the most dramatic, and most violent objects in the universe: Colliding Black holes and Neutron Stars.

RISING TIDES, S05E03, The next generation of Earth observation satellites are now in place maintaining the continuity of long-term climate data, in particular the planets rising temperatures and related ocean levels.

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Fresh Eyes
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Fresh Eyes, S04E06, Two new space telescopes are in orbit and completing their shakedown; Gaia and TESS they too will be joined by the James Webb Telescope.

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Slingshot, S03E06, Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Shore To Shore
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Shore To Shore, S02E04, Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another.

programme.title: Return To The Moon
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Return To The Moon, S01E02, The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos.

programme.title: Interface
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Interface, S03E10, The Ionisphere, where the Earth interfaces with space, is little understood, it effects radio communications, GPS signals and satellites alike.

programme.title: Part 3

programme.title: Part 8

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E05, In the parallel world, Earth’s crust has been penetrated, releasing terrible forces from within the Earth. The Doctor must escape back to his world to prevent the same catastrophe.

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E06, As the Earth in the parallel world faces destruction, the Doctor is desperate to return to his world to warn them of the danger. But time is running out.

programme.title: Part 7
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E07, The Doctor has escaped the doomed, parallel Earth and has returned to his own world where he attempts to put a halt to the drilling project.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Terror of the Autons, S03E01, The Master paves the way for an invasion by the insidious Nestene consciousness.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Terror of the Autons, S03E02, The Master uses his hypnotic powers to take control of a factory where he creates Autons.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Terror of the Autons, S03E03, The only clue to the Master's plans is a single plastic daffodil.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Terror of the Autons, S03E04, The Master is broadcasting an activation signal to open a channel for the Nestenes.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil, S01E01, The Doctor and Jo arrive at Stangmoor Prison for a demonstration of the Keller Machine, a device capable of extracting negative emotions from criminal minds.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil, S01E02, A prison riot puts Jo in danger while the Doctor assists the Brigadier. Meanwhile, at the World Peace Conference, the Chinese delegate's aid prepares to kill the American delegate.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil, S01E03, Newly recovered, the Doctor escapes from his cell with Jo. The Master plans to use the Keller Machine to recruit the rioting inmates at Stangmoor Prison and attack the World Peace Conference.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil, S01E04, The mind parasite within the Keller Machine becomes too powerful for the Master to control. It learns how to move on its own and goes on the hunt for new minds.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil, S01E05, The Master forms an uneasy alliance with the Doctor so that between them they can subdue the Keller Machine which is now out of control.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil, S01E06, The Brigadier brings the prison under control, but the Master has escaped and plans to start a world war. The Keller Machine breaks free of the Doctor's restraining device and the Doctor has no choice but to turn the parasite against the Master.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daemons, S01E01, The Doctor tries to prevent Professor Horner from breaking into an ancient barrow near the village of Devil’s End. Posing as the village vicar, the Master summons dark forces.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daemons, S01E02, Devil’s End is sealed off from the outside world by a heat barrier. The Doctor and Jo return to the barrow where they are confronted by the gargoyle, Bok.

programme.title: Outlaw (of Gor)
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Outlaw (of Gor), S05E26, A hero and loser friend are transplanted to the planet of Gor by mysterious forces and are soon caught up in an evil sorcerer's plot of dastardly evil.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K: Outlaw Of Gor Interview
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E31, Watch some in-depth interviews and get an inside look at the movie itself that is classically riffed in this Mystery Science Theater 3000 episode.
Film Crew The Giant of Marathon, 20071009070000 +0000, The Film Crew rip apart B-Movie legend Steve Reeves and The Giant of Marathon.

MST3K: Gamera, 19910608000000 +0000, A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.
MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians, 19911221000000 +0000, Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.

MST3K: Bloodlust, 19940903000000 +0000, Mike and the Bots watch a cheap ripoff of The Most Dangerous Game, where a rich game hunter tricks a group of stranded college kids into becoming prey for his latest blood sport.

programme.title: Blood Waters of Dr. Z
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Blood Waters of Dr. Z, S10E05, Seeking revenge against those responsible for stripping him of his tenure and the denial of human research subjects, Dr. Z mutates himself into a hideous — and murderous — half-human-half-fish-like creature!
MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula, 20220506000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.

programme.title: Samson vs. The Vampire Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Samson vs. The Vampire Women, S06E25, While Mike and the Bots wrestle with Santo Versus the Vampire Women, TV's Frank is assumed into Second Banana Heaven, leaving no one for Dr. Forrester to kill.
MST3K: The Undead, 19970308000000 +0000, A woman gets hypnotized back into her Dark Age'd past life while Tom takes a crack at being an observer.

A Place for Annie, 19940501000000 +0000, Sissy Spacek stars as a caring nurse who adopts an HIV positive baby but must fight prejudice and the natural mother who wants custody. Also stars Mary-Louise Parker and Joan Plowright. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Missing Pieces, 20000206000000 +0000, A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

After All These Years, 20130420000000 +0000, When a woman is wrongly accused of the death of her ex-husband, she sets out to solve the murder mystery and find the real killer before the day of the funeral, when she is to be taken into custody.

The Water is Wide, 20060129000000 +0000, During the late 1960s, a novice schoolteacher comes to a small island off the coast of South Carolina with the hope of bringing literacy and self-respect to the undereducated, African-American children living there.
Brush With Fate, 20030202000000 +0000, A teacher regales a new colleague with tales of a Vermeer painting's impact on the lives of its past and present owners. Stars Glenn Close, Ellen Burstyn.
Window Wonderland, 20130101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Sloan Van Doren is hoping to take over the head window designer spot.
A Nutcracker Christmas, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A jaded ex-ballerina is forced to come to terms with the life she left behind.
Christmas Festival of Ice, 20170101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Emma sets out to save her town's beloved ice sculpture contest.

Christmas in Conway, 20131201000000 +0000, Hoping it will be the perfect Christmas present for his wife (Mary-Louise Parker), a man (Andy Garcia) plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Epilogue
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E18, Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Blockade
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E19, When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Gauntlet
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E20, After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: Reckoning (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E17, Hidden in the ruined temple on Dakara is an Ancient weapon powerful enough to destroy the Replicators. Thanks to a timely warning, the team knows it. And thanks to Daniel's repressed Ancient knowledge, Replicator Carter knows it as well.

programme.title: Threads
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E18, With a climactic battle behind them, the team turns towards personal matters. Unbeknownst to them, Anubis prepares one final attempt! Meanwhile, Jackson awakens in a way station between the living world and the world of beings that have ascended.

programme.title: Moebius (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E19, Jackson receives documents that point to the location of a ZPM in ancient Egypt. Hoping that the energy source could be used to power Earth's defenses and open a wormhole to Atlantis, SG-1 uses an ancient time machine to travel back to 3000 B.C.

programme.title: Moebius (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E20, SG-1's attempt to recover a ZPM from 3000 B.C. has altered the timeline, leading to a present where the Stargate was never discovered! The alternate-reality Carter and Jackson convince a reluctant O'Neill to take them on their first mission through.

programme.title: Avalon (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E01, Lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell, the newest member of the SG-1 team, sets out on a mission with Daniel Jackson, Teal'c and Vala to uncover a stash of hidden ancient riches. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Avalon (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E02, Still bound together by the Jaffa bracelets, Daniel Jackson and Vala are transported to a galaxy populated by worshippers of a potentially threatening authority called the Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Origin
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E03, Daniel and Vala learn that their reactivation of an ancient communications device has inadvertently exposed Earth to the wrath of the group of unforgiving deities called Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Ties That Bind
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E04, Daniel Jackson and Vala embark on a series of dangerous missions in their quest to unlock the frustrating Jaffa bracelets that seems to have bound them together for eternity. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Powers That Be
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E05, When Daniel and Vala attempt to undo the teachings of the Ori on a distant planet, they and the planet's inhabitants find themselves subject to their foe's vengeful wrath. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Beachhead
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E06, The brilliant astrophysicist and former member Samantha Carter returns to SG-1 to join the team on a mission to free a distant planet called Kallana from the Ori's control. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Ex Deus Machina
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E07, The SG-1 team must intervene when a major ongoing conflict between the strident Jaffa Gerak and their former enemy Ba'al puts the entire United States at risk of destruction. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Babylon
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E08, Lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell disappears while trying to contact the Sodan, a band of legendary Jaffa warriors who escaped Goa'uld rule and colonized their own planet. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Critical Mass
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E13, The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Grace Under Pressure
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E14, While testing a newly repaired puddle jumper, McKay and Captain Hugh Griffin suddenly lose control of the ship and crash into the ocean. As the jumper begins to sink slowly towards the bottom of the ocean, Griffin sacrifices himself to save McKay.

programme.title: Santa Knows
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E14, Kelly considers filing sexual harassment charges against Monahan, but does not want to interfere with a fundraiser for the clinic. Val and David realize how much they mean to each other.

programme.title: Ready Or Not
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E15, Dr. Monahan forces Kelly out of the clinic. Brandon and Steve hire a new assistant, Janet Sosna; and bring David aboard as a music reviewer. Valerie cuts a deal with a bookie operating at the After Dark.

programme.title: Illegal Tender
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E16, David tries to make amends after his first music review gets the artist fired; Valerie ignores Noah's decree to halt the sports betting at the club.

programme.title: Crimes & Misdemeanors
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E19, Despite meeting Noah, Donna's hospitalized grandmother says Donna's fated mate is David, who moves out of Valerie's room; Kelly alerts Brandon to a potential story about an ex-con; Steve coaxes Brandon into a double date.

programme.title: Law & Disorder
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E22, Noah's civil trial begins. His attorney portrays Valerie as a golddigging tramp, and uses the gang's testimony to place Noah in a favorable light. David's record company experiences a shake-up.

programme.title: Aunt Bea's Pickles
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E25, During Valerie's surprise birthday party, Abby announces that she and Bill are engaged. Brandon receives a job offer from a major newspaper but faces a dilemma when he learns he is only being hired as a replacement for striking reporters.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E27, Image seems to be everything at the gang's five-year high-school reunion, where Valerie creates new personas for herself and David, while Andrea Zuckerman tries to hang on to her old one.

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E29, Kelly finds it impossible to trust Brandon as he works late every night for several weeks. Noah entertains Gwyneth, a longtime friend. David becomes extremely jumpy after being robbed at an ATM.

programme.title: The Fundamental Things Apply
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E30, Brandon and Kelly try to help a Bosnian refugee find his wife; Donna puts on a fashion show; Gwyneth takes a page from Valerie's book after admitting feelings for Noah; Steve learns Sarah is married.

programme.title: The Green Room
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E002, Brandon meets Dylan McKay, a brooding classmate. As they become friends, Brandon learns that Dylan's bad-boy act masks a hidden life that few people ever see.

programme.title: Every Dream Has Its Price
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E003, Brenda shops with Kelly and Tiffany and wishes she had their kind of money.

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E004, Brandon is visited by his ex-girlfriend Sheryl but, when she meets Dylan, she's quickly star-struck by his money and glamor.

programme.title: One on One
